text: Nɨ Sol batuegha an danganim inigha atrivimɨn oto. Egha nɨ Solɨn adarazir gumazir avɨribav soghezɨma, me ariaghire. Kamaghɨn, Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨn arazir kurar kam ikarvasi. Egha Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨn danganim iniasa, nɨn otarim Apsalom amɨsevezɨ, a Israelian atrivimɨn oto. Nɨ gumazir gumazibav sozima me ariaghirim, kamaghɨn, God datɨrɨkɨn nɨ gasɨghasɨsi.”
